wikipedia_page.main: Donald Watt (born 23 July 1953) was a Scottish footballer who played for Celtic, Dumbarton and  East Stirlingshire.

response: Amongst those joining up were goalkeeper John Taylor from Queen’s Park, and full backs Peter McQuade and Don Watt from East Fife and Celtic respectively.
* The Spring Cup match against Stenhousemuir on 20 March marked Don Watt's 100th appearance for Dumbarton in all national competitions - the 72nd Dumbarton player to reach this milestone.
